channel.title: Comments on: Setting up Age of Empires 2 Multiplayer For Wine Linux 2019
channel.description: Learn and Play Age Of Empires 2 Just Better

item.title: By: GregStein
item.dc:creator: GregStein
item.content:encoded:
This is the correct code and i have updated it:
file_get=$(wget -q -nv -O- https://api.github.com/repos/gregstein/AoE2Tools/releases/latest | jq -r '.assets[] | select(.browser_download_url | contains(".exe")) | .browser_download_url') && wget --output-document=AoE2Tools.exe $file_get

It was not your fault. My editor seemed to have replaced ‘&’ by ‘& amp;’ for some reason. Thank you for your comment as it helped fixing the typo issue.

item.title: By: TOm1
item.dc:creator: TOm1
item.description: first i want to deeply apologize for my newbieness When i try to download aoe2tool it gives me syntax error near unexpected token ';&' what am i missing? i know must be trivial again i'm sorry
item.content:encoded:
first i want to deeply apologize for my newbieness
When i try to download aoe2tool it gives me syntax error near unexpected token ‘;&’ what am i missing? i know must be trivial again i’m sorry

item.title: By: GregStein

It's fixed now on the latest version. Thank you for notifying!
item.content:encoded: It’s fixed now on the latest version. Thank you for notifying!

item.title: By: GregStein
item.dc:creator: GregStein
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/tutorials/setting-age-empires-2-multiplayer-wine-linux-2019/#comment-95">DJSapsan</a>.
It looks like the installation is missing an "icon" Z:\home\user\data\icon.ico
Here download it and put it in that location: https://ageofnotes.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/icon.ico
item.content:encoded:
It looks like the installation is missing an “icon” Z:\home\user\data\icon.ico

Here download it and put it in that location: https://ageofnotes.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/icon.ico

item.title: By: DJSapsan
item.dc:creator: DJSapsan
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/tutorials/setting-age-empires-2-multiplayer-wine-linux-2019/#comment-95">DJSapsan</a>.
And there is another problem - i got a default hotkeys and not from steam.
item.content:encoded: And there is another problem – i got a default hotkeys and not from steam.

item.title: By: DJSapsan
item.dc:creator: DJSapsan
item.description: Tested with winehq-development on virtual machine with Linux Mint. Not all dotnet i installed because it took too much time. During installation with AoE2ToolCloud i got error at "Final configuration" step. You can check error on pastebin https://pastebin.com/YAxg08cZ. After i got this error i closed it. Then run voobly and everything else was perfect. Game runs without any error. But only one minor problem - some graphical glitch and im pretty sure its because it runs on virtual machine without GPU and i connected via VNC.
item.content:encoded:
Tested with winehq-development on virtual machine with Linux Mint. Not all dotnet i installed because it took too much time.
During installation with AoE2ToolCloud i got error at “Final configuration” step. You can check error on pastebin https://pastebin.com/YAxg08cZ.
After i got this error i closed it. Then run voobly and everything else was perfect. Game runs without any error. But only one minor problem – some graphical glitch and im pretty sure its because it runs on virtual machine without GPU and i connected via VNC.

item.title: By: GregStein
item.dc:creator: GregStein
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/tutorials/setting-age-empires-2-multiplayer-wine-linux-2019/#comment-77">Rafael</a>.
Not native Steam client! In this guide We have used the Steam client of Windows which is installed in Wine32 installation.
item.content:encoded: Not native Steam client! In this guide We have used the Steam client of Windows which is installed in Wine32 installation.
